BasicInfo.short: Xignite provides cloud-based market data distribution solutions to fintech companies and enterprises.

Products.name: XigniteGlobalIndicesRealTime
Products.description: Provides real time index values for more than 10,000 U.S. and international indices.

Products.name: XigniteVWAP
Products.description: Provides real-time, intraday and historical VWAP information.

Products.name: XigniteEdgar
Products.description: This API provides filing information available from the U.S. SEC’s Edgar database.

Products.name: XigniteNASDAQLastSale
Products.description: Provides real-time last sale information (last trade, open, high, low, close, volume) for U.S. equities from NASDAQ.

Products.name: XigniteGlobalHistorical
Products.description: API provides historical prices for equities trading on more than 50 global exchanges.

Products.name: XigniteBondMaster
Products.description: This API offers ‘terms and conditions’ reference data for US bonds including corporate bonds, government bonds and Treasury bonds.

Products.name: XigniteBondsRealTime
Products.description: This API offers realtime traded prices for U.S. corporate bonds and U.S. agency debt bonds.

Products.name: XigniteRates
Products.description: This API offers current and historical benchmark interest rates from global financial markets in U.S., Europe, Canada and Asia.

Products.name: XigniteInsider
Products.description: This API provides real-time data for corporate insider transactions filed with the SEC for U.S. public companies.

Products.name: XigniteCalendar
Products.description: Provides global economic calendars of scheduled Treasury and economic events and announcements.
